website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Xperia XA2 Ultra phablet pairs a large 6-inch screen with impressive camera capabilities, but it lags behind the competition in terms of processing power.

customer_reviews.title: You will struggle to get a better phone for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Have to say for the price of this phone you will struggle to get any better. As you would expect being a Sony product its well made, feels very good quality. I chose this phone because of the screen size and I have to say I'm glad I did. Content looks rich in colour and with the 6" screen it's easy on the eyes. Phone runs the latest andriod platform so is quick and responsive. Photo quality is very good, however in very dark situations it does struggle a little but that's me being picky. I give this phone 5 stars due to price, quality and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: £1000 better.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful phone from Sony Xperia. This has a better camera and a better battery than an iPhone X. Is about £1000 cheaper. Has a memory card slot up to 256gb. 4k video. Stereo recording. Slo-mo video etc. Buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone ! It's quick, easy to use, has a good sized expandable memory of up to 256, is well made, feels quality, great screen, ( 4k ) videos easy to transfer data from my old phone and the main thing for me which I bought it mainly for is the 24mp main camera and as you'd expect from Sony the camera is awesome. Crystal clear pictures ! If you're thinking of buying this phone then go for it. You won't be disappointed. 😁

customer_reviews.title: Meets all expectations

Battery life is average. Love the style of the phone, feels premium quality. Never has a Sony previously but I prefer this to the Samsung S7 edge. Best of all it does not automatically install apps without my permission that I do not want and cannot get rid of (unlike the S7 edge). Only slight disappointment is that photo's appear underexposed.

I have made some decent results with a lot of patience tho. See exampleIf you want a phone that does dark pics well buy an old Nokia lumia. This thing is sturdy battery lasts two days and I use flashlight often. Just google bloat ware and a couple of Sony things installed. Great phone highly reccomend.

Touch screen reactivity is excellent. If you think it's a mid price phone it's good for the money you spend.

I don't understand if is a hardware or software problem, but I think is happening when the phone is not used for a longer period of time, like 30 min to 1 hour.

product_meta.title: Sony Xperia XA2 Ultra 6-Inch 32 GB Android O UK SIM-Free Smartphone - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black| Size Name:XA2 Ultra| Style Name:Single SIM

SONY XPERIA XA2 ULTRA 6-INCH 32 GB ANDROID O UK SIM-FREE SMARTPHONE - BLACK
Xperia XA2 Ultra is a 6" stunning edge to edge screen with diamond cut on the top and bottom.

It has a unique dual front camera system with night portrait flash with 16MP Optical Image Stabilization and also a 8MP super wide angle camera. With the 23MP main camera you can take a picture, crop and still have a sharp high resolution picture and record 4K video. The light sensitivity allows you to take good pictures in low light conditions. It also introduces 120fps slow motion.

Enjoy more speed with Qualcomm Snapdragon Octacore processor.

It is a smartphone you can trust all day with always on fingerprint sensor and large 3580 mAh battery with Qnovo and Smart Stamina and Quick charge 3.0 supported

»

BOX CONTAINS
Mobile phone, charger, USB cable
feature_bullets: dual front camera system with night portrait flash with 16MP Optical Image Stabilization and also a 8MP super wide angle camera
23MP camera with 1/2.3 inch Exmor RS for mobile image sensor with hybrid autofocus quick launch and capture and also features 84 degree wide-angle F2.0 lens with zoom steadyshot
Metallic design. Diamond-cut aluminium top & bottom. Loop surface
